data.message:
It's free choice but 
You didn't win the fight. God is watching all that is happening. May God be with you. For it is written in the Holy Bible on what is the truth. And nothing but the truth. God will cease all and will judge on decisions were made and choices that are made. I have respect on people's choices but I don't agree upon what affects human generations and my children. Now people are going to look at that traditional marriage is wrong when it's the right choice. We have fallen in the hands of man and turned our eyes from God. People wake up!!! We are at war against each other because with wrong choices because its the wrong choices that's affecting everyone. Because now the right choices are not right no more. Dear Lord help us all. Pls God I love you more than anything and pray for these sinners. And EVERYONE affected by the stupid government we have lost this country years ago we are no longer US we are a completely different country.
